globalAttributes.name: data-accordion-multiple-value
globalAttributes.description: Whether or not multiple folds can be expanded. This will allow the use to control what folds are collapsed and expanded.

globalAttributes.name: data-accordion-persist-value
globalAttributes.description: Whether or not to persist a fold. This will prevent the accordion from collapsing all folds, keeping one expanded.

globalAttributes.name: data-accordion-expanded-class
globalAttributes.description: The expanded class name which is added to buttons and folds upon being expanded, ie: transition end

globalAttributes.name: data-accordion-focused-class
globalAttributes.description: The focused class name which is added to buttons and folds that are in focus.

globalAttributes.name: data-accordion-disabled-class
globalAttributes.description: The focused class name which is added to buttons and folds that are disabled.

globalAttributes.name: data-accordion-initial-class
globalAttributes.description: The class to use for loaded folds in an opened state. Applies on button elements, it will expand folds at runtime.

globalAttributes.name: data-accordion-opened-class
globalAttributes.description: The opened class name which is added to buttons and folds upon being opened.
